answers.answer: My dr says call him at 140/90. If its borderline I try to rest and bring it down but if you have other symptoms as well as the bp I'd just call him. The earlier you get it seen to the better. Good luck!

question: How high does blood pressure need to be before u call dr? Had severe pre e with first pregnancy but none with second. On my third and starting to swell at 34 weeks & bp is just a little elevated. It has been almost perfect 120/80 until now & it is 140/80
title: preeclampsia
